washModes.title: Wash Modes

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Transparent prices with no hidden fees

items.question: How does the service work?
items.answer: You place an order through the app, the courier arrives at a convenient time, picks up the clothes, we wash them with professional products and return them clean in 3 hours.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major bank cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), Apple Pay, Google Pay and cash on delivery.

items.question: How quickly do you pick up clothes?
items.answer: We strive to pick up your clothes within 30 minutes after placing an order. You can track the courier's location in real-time through the app.

items.question: What if clothes get damaged?
items.answer: All items are insured. If damage occurs due to our fault, we compensate the full value of the item according to market price.

items.question: Can I cancel an order?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel the order for free until the courier picks up your clothes. After pickup, the standard service cost applies.

items.question: Do you work on weekends?
items.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM, including holidays.

finalCta.title: Ready to try?
finalCta.subtitle: Download the app and get 30% off your first order

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Lotti, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: At Lotti, we collect the following personal information when you use our services:
items: Full name and contact details (email address, phone number)

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information collected to:
items: Process and manage your laundry orders
Communicate with you about your order status
Improve our services and user experience
Comply with legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
section3.intro: We process your personal data under the following legal bases:
section3.contract: Contract execution: To provide the services you have requested
section3.consent: Consent: For marketing communications and non-essential cookies
section3.legitimate: Legitimate interest: To improve our services and prevent fraud
section3.legal: Legal obligation: To comply with legal and tax requirements

section4.title: 4. Sharing Information with Third Parties
section4.intro: We may share your information with:
section4.providers: Service providers: Payment processors, messaging services, hosting
section4.partners: Logistics partners: To coordinate pickup and delivery
section4.noSale: We never sell your personal information to third parties.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.intro: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information:
items: Restricted access to authorized personnel only

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
section6.access: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
section6.rectification: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
section6.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your data
section6.restriction: Restriction: Restrict the processing of your data
section6.portability: Portability: Receive your data in structured format
section6.objection: Objection: Object to the processing of your data
section6.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:

section7.title: 7. Data Retention
section7.intro: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary:
section7.account: Account data: While your account is active
section7.marketing: Marketing data: Until you withdraw your consent
section7.cookies: Cookie data: As specified in our Cookie Policy

section8.title: 8. International Transfers
section8.intro: Your data may be transferred outside the EEA with appropriate safeguards:
items: Standard contractual clauses approved by the EU

section9.title: 9. Minors
section9.content: We do not knowingly collect information from individuals under 18 years of age.

section10.title: 10. Cookies
section10.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. See our

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Policy
section11.content: We may update this policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.intro: For questions about this policy, contact us:
section12.complaint: You may file a complaint with the AEPD:
